tag_list: mantra-technologies, saas, software-development, offshore-development, opd, outsourced-product-development
overview: Hemant is founder and CEO of Mantra Technologies. He founded Mantra after more than 15 years of software development and project management. Prior to starting Mantra Technologies, he worked with Accenture and many other technology companies in Southeast US, as a consultant and Project Manager. Hemant has 6+ years of experience in Global Project Delivery and Management experience. He also has domain knowledge and experience in BFSI (Banking, Financial Services and Insurance), Healthcare and Telecommunication.

image.attribution: Hemant Panse / Mantra Technologies
